B. The Centipede is located within the prison

B. b) The Centipede is a punishment used in the prison.
C. c) Inmates from the Centipede are transferred to the infirmary.

Answer: a) Hughes created the Centipede punishment., b) The Centipede is a punishment used in the prison., c) Inmates from the Centipede are transferred to the infirmary.

Question: What roles do Bill and the Centipede play in the prison setting?
Options:

B. b) The Centipede is a punishment system used within the prison.
C. c) Bill is an inmate who has been transferred to the infirmary.
D. d) The Centipede operates solely outside of the prison.
Answer: a) Bill is surgically connected to another inmate as part of the Centipede punishment. and b) The Centipede is a punishment system used within the prison.
